imdb.plot outline: IFINews wants independent filmmakers to be able to navigate this ever-changing, fast-changing world of indie film so they can take the movie they made and bring it to its largest, best audiences; deliver the best possible technical production of their movie; have the fewest possible conflicts with their cast, crew, and above-the-line people; avoid many distribution nightmares, and reach their movie's greatest potential for profitability. Information that will help build the infrastructure of the independent film industry.
imdb.title: Indie Film Industry News
plot: IFI_News_ (qv) wants independent filmmakers to be able to navigate this ever-changing, fast-changing world of indie film so they can take the movie they made and bring it to its largest, best audiences; deliver the best possible technical production of their movie; have the fewest possible conflicts with their cast, crew, and above-the-line people; avoid many distribution nightmares, and reach their movie's greatest potential for profitability. Information that will help build the infrastructure of the independent film industry.::Barnard, Michael R.
